text: @realDonaldTrump @SeanParnellUSA And isn't this part of the reason for making meat processing plants a vital need? Mostly, immigrants work there. So, if they get sick/die from covid19, no big deal, right? They aren't important in your life, are they? Never mind that they have families to whom they're important.
